name: @janhq/inference-nitro-extension
description: This extension embeds Nitro, a lightweight (3mb) inference engine written in C++. See nitro.jan.ai
author: Jan <service@jan.ai>

scripts.build:publish:darwin: rimraf *.tgz --glob && npm run build && ../../.github/scripts/auto-sign.sh npm pack && cpx *.tgz ../../electron/pre-install
scripts.build:publish:win32: rimraf *.tgz --glob && npm run build && npm pack && cpx *.tgz ../../electron/pre-install
scripts.build:publish:linux: rimraf *.tgz --glob && npm run build && npm pack && cpx *.tgz ../../electron/pre-install
